patthana8.65:4.1: Nasukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.65:5.1: Nanasukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.65:6.1: Nasukhasahagatañca nanasukhasahagatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.65:7.1: Hetuyā nava … pe … purejāte āsevane cha … pe … avigate nava.
